title: Can I do a B.Ed after a B.E. (EEE)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes , although the terminology for a teaching qualification varies with the country. In Ireland or UK it would be a post graduate diploma in education or a higher diploma in education and would be s requirement for gaining employment in the state sector…which is the largest education provider. Engineering graduates and physical scientist graduates are highly sought after for teaching. The majority of teachers tend to come from an arts background, so Engineering would have a novelty value.
S POSSIBLE. TAMILNADU GOVT. ADMITS BES FOR B.ED. U CAN GO TO SCHOOLS. BESIDES FOR LECTURER IN POLYTECHNIC COLLEGE,ITI, IN ENGG COLLEGE ETC.,
